name: Subject #1017
description:
Subject 1017, Prof Evil Ph.D has stopped his experiments for the day. Using your power to switch between man and monster, you must balance your inner demon and humanity to escape. But even if you do manage to climb over the ladders and evade the prof’s other creations, what sort of future is there for such a monster? This project was created in 2 days for the Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme of "duality"!

HOW TO PLAY: 

WASD for movement 

Transform with Space 

Your human form can only climb ladders and enter doors. Your monster form can jump and break obstacles!

Credits:

Programmers: JT Torrea, Gia Lang, Ryan Lampotang

Art: Kaley Chong, Michaela Chang, Cecil Kong

Narrative and Sound: Josh Wolk
